name: Sarah Johnson
summary: Dynamic Marketing Manager with 6+ years of experience driving brand growth and customer engagement across digital channels. Expertise in developing data-driven marketing strategies that increased customer acquisition by 150% and improved ROI by 200%. Skilled in leading cross-functional teams and managing multi-million dollar marketing budgets.

experience.title: Senior Marketing Manager
experience.description:
• Lead digital marketing strategy for portfolio of 5 brands with combined revenue of $50M annually
  • Increased organic website traffic by 180% through comprehensive SEO and content marketing initiatives
  • Managed $3M annual marketing budget with consistent 5:1 ROI across all channels
  • Built and mentored team of 8 marketing professionals including content creators, designers, and analysts
  • Launched successful product campaigns that generated $12M in revenue within first 6 months

experience.title: Marketing Manager
experience.description:
• Developed and executed multi-channel marketing campaigns resulting in 150% increase in customer acquisition
  • Implemented marketing automation workflows using HubSpot, improving lead nurturing efficiency by 75%
  • Grew social media following from 10K to 250K across all platforms in 18 months
  • Reduced customer acquisition cost by 40% through optimization of paid advertising campaigns
  • Collaborated with sales team to create content that generated 500+ qualified leads monthly

experience.title: Digital Marketing Specialist
experience.description:
• Managed Google Ads and Facebook Ads campaigns with monthly budgets up to $100K
  • Created email marketing campaigns with average open rate of 28% and click-through rate of 4.5%
  • Conducted market research and competitor analysis to inform marketing strategies
  • Produced 50+ blog posts and social media content pieces monthly
